background_context.situation: New resident in Santa Barbara, seeking to connect with the community.
background_context.environment: Community organization with various clubs and committees.
background_context.constraints: Overwhelming amount of options for clubs; needs a streamlined process.

goals_motivations.drives: Desire to build connections and engage with the local community.
goals_motivations.achievements: Finding and joining clubs that align with personal interests.

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Primarily relies on mobile app for accessing information.
behaviors_patterns.habits: Tends to overlook websites in favor of more user-friendly mobile experiences.

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Overwhelming information on the website; lack of engaging design.
pain_points_frustrations.issues: Website appears dated and is not user-friendly; too much text without highlights.

needs_desires.improvements: A more modern, inviting website; streamlined access to information.
needs_desires.desires: Clear visual representation of events and committees; mobile-friendly design.

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes in the importance of effective communication to engage users.
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Favors visually appealing and concise information delivery.

technical_comfort.tools: Mobile app for events and registration; avoids using the website.
technical_comfort.abilities: Comfortable navigating various applications; prefers intuitive designs.
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Prefers visual learning and engaging, interactive content.

quotes: I never once used the website. I used the app.
There's an overwhelming amount of clubs and groups to join.
You need to pick or focus on a few things that you really want to highlight.
